hiveArticle.title: A Beautiful Small Flowers
hiveArticle.body:
It doesn't matter if you are big or small, even the smallest of flowers are beautiful. As you can see below these flowers are really small but the beauty of these flowers are great.

![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmR8mA1JfHAw2F84shaNwZXz9Rm3VAFXcRRaaLzEewLQ6u)

<hr>

![image.png](https://ipfs.busy.org/ipfs/QmNPPSk6PgDzHRDVEqhTvpu6S3q2qWrNf4Y6mmoiEz9GSN)

### Camera : Nokia 6
